code: @Test public void testNoResourceA() throws Exception {     // there should be no message body     getMockEndpoint("mock:result").expectedMessageCount(1).     getMockEndpoint("mock:result").message(0).body().isNull().     template.sendBody("direct:a", "Hello World").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }
public void configure() {     from("direct:a").enrich("direct:foo").to("mock:result").     // set an empty message     from("direct:foo").setBody(constant(null)). }

protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() {             from("direct:a").enrich("direct:foo").to("mock:result").             // set an empty message             from("direct:foo").setBody(constant(null)).         }     }. }
